If you are looking for a job at a fast food restaurant (like mcdonalds, burger king... )what are the postions can you apply for? 3 years ago Report Abuse by ? Member since: July 11, 2009 Total points: 2,107 (Level 3) Add Contact Block
Best Answer - Chosen by Voters Positions at fast food restaurants are considered cashier, to-go, food handler, assistant manager, manager and so on up to regionals and CFO's :)
The best advice I received when I was younger and filling out applications was to put AVAILABLE in the position slot and NEGOTIABLE in the pay rate slot (this way you can be offered the position and be paid what everyone else is being paid in that position.
It gives you more room to decide once they offer you the job Hope that helped 3 years ago Report Abuse 67% 2 Votes 1 person rated this as good

Front Counter or a cashier: Greet customer, verify customer orders, handle money
Team Leader or Hospitality Leader: Lead the team by doing what is expected of you or more and encouraging everyone
Drive-Thru: Greet individuals on the run, take orders, need to be fast and proficient handling money
Cook: stay on the grill serving hot food
Management: To make sure production is active and food is quality, officiate the whole restaurant to make sure it operate smoothly
